chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall A B : PO, R (cons (vec A B) (vec B A)) pi

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D
*** [ cons : V -> V -> AV ]
*** [ PO : Type ]
*** [ R : AV -> AV -> Prop ]
*** [ vec : PO -> PO -> V ]
somme_triangle : forall A B C : PO, R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (plus (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)) (cons (vec C A) (vec C B)))) pi
triangle_isocele : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A B) (vec A C)) (double (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)))) pi
isocele_permute : forall A B C : PO, isocele A B C -> R (plus (cons (vec A C) (vec A B)) (double (cons (vec B A) (vec B C)))) pi
construction_isocele_base : forall (A B : PO) (a : AV), exists u v : V, R (cons (vec A B) u) (cons v (vec B A)) /\ R (cons u v) (double a)
tangente : forall A B O T : PO, isocele O A B -> orthogonal (vec A T) (vec O A) -> R (double (cons (vec A T) (vec A B))) (cons (vec O A) (vec O B))
tangente_reciproque : forall A B O T T' : PO, isocele O A B -> orthogonal (vec A T) (vec O A) -> R (double (cons (vec A T') (vec A B))) (cons (vec O A) (vec O B)) -> colineaire (vec A T) (vec A T')
isocele = fun A B C : PO => R (cons (vec B C) (vec B A)) (cons (vec C A) (vec C B)) : PO -> PO -> PO -> Prop
angle_inscrit : forall A B M O : PO, isocele O M A -> isocele O M B -> R (double (cons (vec M A) (vec M B))) (cons (vec O A) (vec O B))
opp_vect : forall A B : PO, vR (opp (vec A B)) (vec B A)
cocyclique : forall M A B O M' : PO, isocele O A B -> isocele O M A -> isocele O M B -> isocele O M' A -> isocele O M' B -> R (double (cons (vec M' A) (vec M' B))) (double (cons (vec M A) (vec M B)))
unicite_circonscrit : forall M A B O O' : PO, isocele O A B -> isocele O M B -> isocele O M A -> isocele O' A B -> isocele O' M B -> isocele O' M A -> (colineaire (vec O A) (vec O' A) /\ colineaire (vec O B) (vec O' B)) /\ colineaire (vec O M) (vec O' M)
v_vec : forall (u : V) (A : PO), exists B : PO, vR u (vec A B)
option_map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> option A -> option B
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
non_vide_P : exists A : PO, A = A
Inductive sumbool (A B : Prop) : Set := left : A -> {A} + {B} | right : B -> {A} + {B} Arguments sumbool (_ _)%type_scope Arguments left {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments right {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
oppu_u : forall u : V, R (cons (opp u) u) pi
angle_plat : forall u : V, R (cons u (opp u)) pi
oppu_v : forall u v : V, R (cons (opp u) v) (plus pi (cons u v))
ssrbool.if_expr : forall A : Type, bool -> A -> A -> A
somme_permute : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons v u) (plus (cons (opp u) w) (cons (opp w) (opp v)))) pi
somme_pi : forall u v w : V, R (plus (cons u v) (plus (cons w (opp u)) (cons (opp v) (opp w)))) pi
BinInt.Z.le_ind : forall A : BinNums.Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : BinNums.Z, A n -> (forall m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> A m -> A (BinInt.Z.succ m)) -> forall m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> A m
ssrfun.tag = projT1 : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type), {x : A & P x} -> A Arguments ssrfun.tag {A}%type_scope {P}%function_scope
Refl.make_impl : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop -> Prop
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
orthogonal = fun u v : V => R (double (cons u v)) pi : V -> V -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments Datatypes.cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Relation_Definitions.relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Relation_Definitions.relation _%type_scope
